alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 07 at 6:29AM PST until January 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 18 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Anatone, Cloverland Road, Peola, and Mountain Road. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds along with falling and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact travel on Monday morning and evening. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
